attributes.action: When a petition gets 100,000 signatures, it MUST be debated in Parliament
attributes.additional_details: The most recent example is the petition about sacking Jeremy Hunt, many people signed it and yet the reply did not address the issue at all. This is simply not good enough.
attributes.background:
This website is a great idea, getting the people to speak up on the issues that matter to them, however, when those petitions are ignored or given a token reply, it becomes a farce.
To engage with the electorate, any petition with sufficient signatures should be debated, not considered for debate
